price: 62 Les damnés se demanderont : « Pourquoi ne voyons-nous pas ces hommes qui, à nos yeux, étaient si misérables ?
arabic: وَقَالُواْ مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالٗا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَشۡرَارِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: waqālū mā lanā lā narā rijālan kunnā naʿudduhum mina al-ashrāri
